title: The Silca x The Radavist x Time Bicycles Ultimate Bike Give Away
content:
We’ve partnered up with Silca and Time Bicycles for an Ultimate Bike Giveaway! One lucky winner will receive an ADHX 45 gravel bike in their size choice. Read on for more information below…

One lucky winner of The Silca x The Radavist x Time Bicycles Ultimate Bike Giveaway will receive a complete Time ADHX 45 bicycle in their size choice. Color may very based on stock. Including a Sram Mullet Force x Eagle Groupset, FSA Cockpit and a full suite of Silca Accessories and tools.

Time Bicycles focus on craft and quality and super tight tolerances, which perfectly aligns with the Silca’s brand ethos of the pursuit of perfection.

Time Bicycles is at the forefront of carbon fiber manufacturing and bike production. They utilize two unique processes, Braided Carbon Structure and Resin Transfer Molding, to build immensely strong, light, and stable bikes. They are one of the only bike companies in the world to produce frames in this way, which is used in aerospace, elite motorsports, and the automotive industry.

Official build spec differs from photos of bike shown.

Bike spec:

  • It would be the following https://shop.timebicycles.com/products/adhx-45-sram-force-eagle-1x-copy
  • Size: your choice XS-XL
  • Color: May vary
  • Bars: FSA Wing AGX
  • Seatpost: FSA SLK
  • Stem: FSA SMR
  • Groupset: Sram Force x Eagle Mullet
  • Wheelset: Boyd GVL

Silca Items included: 

  • Pre-waxed race day chain
  • Nastro Cushino 3.75 Bar Tape
  • Sicuro Bottle Cages
  • Chisela Computer Mount
  • Choice of: Gravelero Mini pump or frame pump
  • Mattone saddle bag
  • SuperPista Ultimate Floor Pump
  • Ultimate Chain Wax System
  • Secret Chain Blend Wax
  • StripChip EnduranceChip
  • Super Secret Drip Wax
  • T-handle Folio
  • Silca Hirobel Frame Clamp
  • Ultimate Bike Was Kit

 

Official Rules: No purchase necessary, by entering the contest you are agreeing to receive marketing communications via email or text from Silca, The Radavist, and Time Bicycles. This includes but is not limited to flows, added to cart notifications, and abandonment emails from these brands. Winner will be choose at random via random number generator. NOTE THIS IS A CONTINENTAL UNITED STATES ONLY GIVE AWAY. If you are already signed up to receive communications from one of these brands you still need to fill out the form. Winner will be officially contacted by Silca via email entered. First name last initial and location will be posted on Instagram on November 30th at noon eastern. If the winner does not claim prize in 72 hours a new random winner will be selected. The Entry Period is November 1st Nov 29th. MUST BE 18 OR OLDER TO WIN.
